page.title: 09MY VILLAGE
page.content: I have lived in Little Clacton all my life & I would not like to move to any other place. All my friends live here too. There isn't much vandalism & it is quite quiet. Most of the homes are bungalows & it is a place for older & retired people. In the winter they don't like us throwing snowballs, but really its a friendly place to live. There are farms all round the village & it has three caravan sites. Our playing field has a climbing frame but the swings & the roundabout have had to be taken down. During the summer time, London Road gets very busy because of all the holiday makers coming through. They are going to the beaches or to one of the caravan parks. It is difficult for us to cross the road. But Little Clacton has all the facilities that my family needs & I think its a nice place to live.
